column1: # The original ethereal-ng mod clears biomes and decorations, but retains ore distributions;
#       therefore, it is recommended that this remix is used together with the "mtgame_mini" and
# Note that ethereal-ng adds more ore distributions that appear in desert stone, assuming that the
#       ore distributions from minetest_game are still present
# Coconuts now drop themselves, rather than coconut slices, for consistency with moretrees coconuts
# See the STANDARDS file for more information about what belongs in each category, and what does not
